website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice for consumers who want to feel like they're indulging in a healthy candy bar.
pros: Low in calories yet rich in flavor
Bars feature dark chocolate for added nutrition and taste
cons: Tend to melt in hot conditions
less practical to take along on warm days

customer_reviews.title: Made For Sharing
customer_reviews.text: I see questions here about ingredients so I have scanned the label and uploaded photos along with this review. I also scanned the bottom and side panel from the master carton these come in and have uploaded those images as well. I like these well enough to have set up a Subscribe & Save subscription for monthly delivery. My only advice is just to be careful about ordering in warmer months because these have a chocolate base that can become a melted mess. These ship with cold packs in the master box during warm weather; just make sure that once delivered you get them in the house or a cool environment as soon as possible to avoid a potential mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sam-I-Am

customer_reviews.title: Even picky kids would eat these
customer_reviews.text: “WOW” I am not on a diet per se, but I have made a lifestyle change to include better foods. I happened upon these goodness knows bars after typing healthy snack into the search. I read the ingredients, took note of the caloric intake, realized these bars could be a part of my diet so I ordered them, not expecting much!! BOY was I wrong!! The peanut butter ones and the mixed berry/almond bars completely satisfy my cravings for something sweet!! I am more than ok with that!! I recommend highly and parents I even believe your kids will eat these too!!!
customer_reviews.author: ACE Light

customer_reviews.title: Great for a long road trip
customer_reviews.text: I have no words. Okay, here are some words. These bars are so ridiculously tasty. I couldn't even believe how good they were. I think I ate three in a row...before the hike started. We demolished the box during the road trip, and I still look sadly into my hiking bag in case I somehow left one there. The chocolate and blueberry flavor was so perfectly melded and the almonds added a great texture. Probably my favorite bar out there (except for maybe mint chocolate Cliff bars...I'll have to do more research heh heh).
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Nice mix of flavors
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tasty bar (or 4 mini bars rather). I buy them for 3 out 5 members in our home. they can be used for a dessert, which I have done several times, just sweet enough. or great grab and go snack to tide you over until lunch or dinner. Nice mix of flavors. I recommend them to other often.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: These are so good. I often travel for work and these are perfect to throw in my bag for a quick and easy snack. It's so much easier to avoid the bowls of candy when I know I have one of these handy. I ordered both cranberry and blue berry and the cranberry is far and above the best one.
customer_reviews.author: NV Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Addictive
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and addictive. I used to buy these one by one at a store, but it’s so much more convenient to buy them by the box. And cheaper. I find them very satisfying. There are four squares in each pack, but I usually only eat two at a time. My latest box purchase was in warm weather, and it came in an insulated box with cold pack.
customer_reviews.author: JLee

customer_reviews.title: Good Golly Sweet Molly
customer_reviews.text: Good Golly Sweet Molly! These things are delicious!!! Even my two co-workers thought the same...and neither of them typically like food bars. The fruit left a pleasant taste that was very refreshing. Each bar is pre broken into 4 squares that make them easy to pop in your mouth without biting them and having pieces crumble on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong here. Why 4 stars, well not enough peanut butter taste for me. Dont get me wrong, its tasty and toasty. Just under my peanut butter radar. Would I buy it again, sure why not. But there are dark chocolate peanut butter candies that I might prefer. Just me!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer40534

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treat!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like about these! Delicious and healthy with no added crap! Hurray! I also love they come in 4 pc squares. Easy to share, but it’s possible you may not want to!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lamirand

customer_reviews.title: This product is excellent. Wherever I used to buy it
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. Wherever I used to buy it, they discontinued it so I chose to have it delivered. Don't usually do that with food but it's worth it for Goodness Knows.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Jones

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: We had these snack bars at Walt Disney World and had to find them! They are so yummy and just the right size for a snack. They are quite tasty and chewy. I would definitely recommend trying them if you like fruit and granola bars. They were given out as an alternative to the peanut butter candy for our friend who has allergies. Quite a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expires in less than 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: The bars that I got expire in less than 2 months! The carton was falling apart from being soaked with melted ice packs, but product is dry inside, probably because it expires so soon.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyStar

customer_reviews.title: melted chocolate
customer_reviews.text: These are good but not as good as the cranberry squares. And....though they came in isolated bag with ice packs. The ice packs were totally melted and the chocolate behind the square has melted onto the cardboard slip. Not very happy and not at all what I had with the cranberry product...
customer_reviews.author: E.C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Packing Overkill
customer_reviews.text: Without even trying these bars, I will probably not get again. I bought one box of 12 bars. It came in a 12x12x12 box full of much plastic and paper. The worst part was that it had apparently been packed with cold packs (no indication on box that I could discern) and once I unpacked all the stuffing I was left with a totally soaked box that had fallen apart. I don't know what the cold packs are made of, but my bars have been sitting in it. I hope the wrappers are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Elliott

customer_reviews.title: delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars and no longer see them in the supermarkets. They are delcious and contain healthy ingredients and low in calories compared to other bars with similar ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfying. It has substance so you can't just inhale them and with chewing deliberately, when you're finished, you are ready to rock and roll. I took them on a series of long flights and they are much better than the snacks they offer for giving you some energy and sustaining your body. One bar, put into 4 small bites, chewy and tasty, no gmo's, all natural and better than trail mix by far. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: I love these snack bars
customer_reviews.text: I love these snack bars! They are sweet but aren't as bad for you as other bars and make a great afternoon snack. I've found them on sale locally for $1 per "bar" (four squares) and so this is comparable and considerably easier!
customer_reviews.author: SHSTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I really love these, however my lost box had two packs ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love these, however my lost box had two packs with only one square in them. Not sure what’s going on, never had that happen before.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hall

customer_reviews.title: Too little protein and too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: Taste was good but WAY TOO little protein and too many sugars. You might as well just buy a candy bar except the calories are only 150 here.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these snack bars. They are just sweet enough and the protein provided by the nuts buys me some time until I can get a real meal in. Husband and kids love them too and they are really easy to just grab and throw in a bag or lunch box. I also like the almond and cranberry ones.
customer_reviews.author: swanja_mama

customer_reviews.title: Too much dark chocolate
customer_reviews.text: The bitter dark chocolate coating overwhelms the peanut taste in these bars. They would be a lot better with a peanut butter flavored coating or even milk chocolate rather than the dark chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: What excellent flavor these have! We hike in the mountains near our home, and a couple of these go in our backpack when we head out. I occasionally take me to work for a breakfast bar. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: B Grvs

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. No gmo, healthy ingredients and super tasty! A great snack, quick breakfast, or tasty pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: K Jinks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Low-Cal Treat
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I like that they are segmented into four little squares. If I'm watching my calories carefully, I'll often have two squares as a sweet treat after lunch or dinner and they totally "do the trick" and satisfy the sweet tooth. This flavor in particular is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile + Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Sheer pleasure! I was absolutely surprised to see no artificial ingredients. I honestly cannot enjoy the bitterness of quality chocolate, although I know the brain utilizes it. Mixture of real fruit balances the chocolate + creates delight! Excellent R + D. By the way, I am a lifetime Snickers Fan, so I was proud of the Mars Corporation for offering this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Needs ingredient list
customer_reviews.text: Contains soy. Waste of money for anyone avoiding soy protein. And Amazon neglected to provide ingredients list in description so I walked right into this.
customer_reviews.author: From The Tree House

customer_reviews.title: Peach cherry is delicious!
customer_reviews.text: The peach version is the only flavor I've tried but I really like them! I saved money by ordering through Amazon since they run $2 ea at my local store.
customer_reviews.author: H. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Very good bars!
customer_reviews.text: Can be eaten for breakfast or a snack. Easy to share since bar is in 4 pcs. The bit of chocolate make is seem like a real treat. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, quick snack!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty,! Great with that first cup of coffee in the morning even while you're driving to work. 4 nice little cubes just the perfect size for a snack or for breakfast! All flavors are good. Moist, not dry and hard, not overly sweet. Just right!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kay

customer_reviews.title: I'm Addicted
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite snack! They're healthy, great for on-the-go, and have great flavor! I have tried a bunch of different health snack bars and none have come close to being this good. The peach/cherry is my favorite flavor, but I have tried the others as well and liked those too.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Trail
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this is a healthy snack with just the right number of calories. the only thing I would change would be to have a little more protein in it. Love the taste!
customer_reviews.author: PBT

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely be ordering again!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious snack, real food, thoughtful shipping with cool packs to prevent the chocolate from melting. Will definitely be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: luvuam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Very tasty. The crunch/chewy factor is just right as far as I am concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic47

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like that.
customer_reviews.text: I have two weeks to eat them all before they expire. Shouldn't it be cheaper when the product is about to expire? I didn't like that .
customer_reviews.author: Ulises Guaresti

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste - Good for You
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars. Great ingredients, great taste, low calorie. Very sad you can't find them in a grocery store any more. Thank you Amazon for having them!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Real blueberry taste
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way these little squares taste. I find one or two squares are a wonderful ending to a healthy meal.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tarlow

customer_reviews.title: 150 calories of deliciousness!
customer_reviews.text: The most tasty 150 calories you will ever eat! Yummy, tastes like you are eating a candy bar, and very satisfying. No negatives here, except that I can not find them at my local supermarket. Luckily you can have them automatically sent to you from Amazon. My UPS driver and my mailperson are always excited when they deliver my bars, because I give them one. They also come in three additional flavors that are tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Gram

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This variety has a nutty/dark chocolate flavor. Not fruity like some of the other flavors which I like as well. These are delicious! I’m glad I bought them!!
customer_reviews.author: Aida Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: These bars expire on 8/18 and I just received them
customer_reviews.author: DG2

customer_reviews.title: As good as most candy bars but much healthier
customer_reviews.text: These are really really good. I've been trying hard to eat clean lately and sometimes if a miss sweets or candy these take the place and I find them very satisfying. I reorder them often.
customer_reviews.author: M. Timmins

customer_reviews.title: They are normally delicous what happen that you send me a beat uo
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this for years and love them but yesterday one arrived all beat up and the bars tasted so bad i was shocked
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R. McVeigh

customer_reviews.title: This is an item our daughter requested us to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an item our daughter requested us to buy for her. She eats one for breakfast everyday. She loves them. It is a quality product. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great low cal snack with all kinds of healthy ingredients ...
customer_reviews.text: Great low cal snack with all kinds of healthy ingredients plus chocolate. Who doesn't love chocolate. Also, Gluten Free, Vegan etc. Good find.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack
customer_reviews.text: Such a great snack for our family. My teen loves these and I can’t find around here any more
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & perfectly portioned
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and perfectly portioned for a quick snack or a grabbing a few preworkout calories... I grabbed one last week from schnuck's to tide me over between lunch and dinner and immediately hopped online to see if I could get a box at a decent price :-)
customer_reviews.author: CL Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. I love having them especially when I travel because I am gluten-free. Seems they are discontinuing them though I cannot find them in stores anymore. That’s so sad!
customer_reviews.author: Carol S

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty!  Addictive!
customer_reviews.text: I originally discovered these at Costco, which were wrapped in single square servings, perfect for an on-the-go snack and 40 calories each. These are bars with 4 pre-cut squares. There is chocolate on the bottom. Peach is my favorite flavor (between peach and the Cherry Almond).
customer_reviews.author: C. Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Yummy yummy yummy. My grandkids love these bars. I send them to Oregon for them to enjoy. They give them 10 stars
customer_reviews.author: N. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Not as fresh nor as tasty as I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a good attempt at a snack square, they are small, but fairly good, though not as fresh as I would have liked. Taste is lacking as well, which may be the result of it not being as fresh as possible, because with so many ingredients which should have a good taste, this really is somewhat bland.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun GourmetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: these are really good and I can work and not get hungry til ...
customer_reviews.text: these are really good and I can work and not get hungry til normal lunch time for me approximately 4 hours from when I eat one.
customer_reviews.author: Tmary

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: The blueberry flavor is very good. I like the little segments. The whole bar is less calories than a typical Kind Bar.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Dream

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Better than I even expected for a pretty healthy snack would be. Really tastes good. The chocolate is not bitter like dark chocolate is sometimes. Just the right sweetness to these bites. 4 are a nice snack mid day or we have them after dinner when craving sweet without feeling too guilty.
customer_reviews.author: Dontmesswithtx

customer_reviews.title: If you like little squares of dried peach and cherry
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged; delicious. If you like little squares of dried peach and cherry, and almonds all resting on a bed of sweet, dark chocolate, you will love these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: Thought they needed salt, but, after eating for a couple weeks, they don't. Pergect as they are.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bade

customer_reviews.title: Wrong flavor
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but it was not the flavor I ordered. I ordered mixed Berry, but received blueberry with almonds. Still good, but just not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: goodnessknows
customer_reviews.text: I have been seeing commercial for goodnessknows bars all over the tv and I had to give these a try. These are really good. They come in a pack with 3 little bite size pieces. The nuts are a nice size and flavor and the bits of dried peach chunks are good just kinda wish there was a little bit more of it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shipping
customer_reviews.text: We like this product very much and were happily surprised when it arrived today in an insulated bag with two cold packs.
customer_reviews.author: David & Cathy Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious and addicting. I went through them too fast so I won't re-order. If you have a sweet tooth and can control your portions, give these a try. Better than granola bars, candy bars, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect peach taste!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect peach taste! I'm so bored of most granola bars, they all taste the same. Not these! I found them to taste exactly as you would think based on the subscription. Absolutely delcious!
customer_reviews.author: Keeley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It has 4 items in each covered candy. I've used it to let a bunch take a small item. They really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty H

customer_reviews.title: Great for mid-day snacks at work
customer_reviews.text: Picked one of these up on a road trip and immediately came home and ordered a box. Great for mid-day snacks at work, I definitely feel a boost in energy and they taste like you aren't being healthy at all. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. the packaging they arrived is was kool too!!! I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get these in my town by the box - only single so .....
customer_reviews.author: valarie yurkunas

customer_reviews.title: I like these but love the cranberry dark chocolate flavor better
customer_reviews.text: I like these but love the cranberry dark chocolate flavor better. They taste better than expected. Love the chocolate on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Mpereira

customer_reviews.title: Shorted
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box of Goodness Knows Cranberry, Almond and Dark Chocolate Snacks. There are only 10 Bars instead of the advertised 12. It doesn't look like the box has been tampered with. I haven't opened a bar to check the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these! Great combination and wonderful flavors. I love that they come in 4 little squares which makes it easy to eat one or two and save the rest for later if you want to.
customer_reviews.author: andowd

customer_reviews.title: Good snack
customer_reviews.text: Good snack when you want something a little sweet without a ton of calories. Also tried the cranberry ones which were also good.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Luster

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, but it was not quite what I ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but it was not quite what I expected. I thought each piece would be a different flavor, not all flavors mixed together in each piece. Very good though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? These are great bars. It is pre-cut in bite sizes which is cool too. I love the taste and it has dark chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: despond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its hard for me to only limit myself to one a day
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Satisfies that crunch/bit of chocolate craving. 4 little bites, but they are high in calories, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: I Michel

customer_reviews.title: great snack
customer_reviews.text: I tried these out and fell in love with them. They are cut up in bit size so it is easy to eat . It is full flavored.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay!
customer_reviews.text: Only giving these a mid rating. Not as fresh as they could have been. Seemed lacking in flavor, but then I was comparing them to Brookside and they wete far more flavorable!
customer_reviews.author: kapu

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite granola bar
customer_reviews.text: These are so delicious! My new favorite granola bar! The only reason that I gave it 4 stars is because the price keeps fluctuating.
customer_reviews.author: E. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: I normally like these but for some reason this box came and was white all over when opened. It was like the bars were moldy even though they were still within the expiration date. I'm disappointed because the 1st box I got was damaged and the 2nd was moldy. I canceled all of my Subscribe & Save orders for multiple flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Come packed with ice packs bc of chocolate. Only issue was ice packs made the boxes soggy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Rego

customer_reviews.title: Very good snack.
customer_reviews.text: So handy for a quick pick me up and very good.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy Snack
customer_reviews.text: These are the best health food snacks that you can buy, my 10yr old son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Mark  S

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Love them. For 150 calories and great taste you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Straight shot

customer_reviews.title: Favorite snack!
customer_reviews.text: Great snack! Love that I can pronounce all of the ingredients. Hits the spot when I need a little pick-me-up towards the end of the work day.
customer_reviews.author: sob2sln

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever put in my mouth.
customer_reviews.text: I opened them and though "they look like power bars." Well, they don't TASTE like power bars. They taste like sin and heaven all rolled into one deliciousness.
customer_reviews.author: Dumestre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tasting bars. I liked the fact that each 'bar' is divided into squares.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey's Pal

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! Because it has dark chocolate & fruit, it quinches my sweet tooth in a healthy way. I use as a snack. Just wish it was a little less costly.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim looking for something healthy to snack on. What a pleasant surprise. They taste really good.Will definitely try other flavors and buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need better refrigeration for mailing. Mine arrived with melted chocolate.Love the bars though!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are delishous! I have purchased the almond cranberry ones and liked them so thought I would try this flavor and am happy to say they did not disappoint! So yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Hollis W

customer_reviews.title: You can't get any better service that this
customer_reviews.text: OMG. I already knew that these were delicious. But I was also a little concerned cause I knew how heat sensitive there were. So, was I surprised to see that they packed the IN FOAM WITH AN ICE PACK!! You can't get any better service that this. I'll be buying more cause they will go quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: Louis M. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a candy bar
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and a very tasty snack. Much better than a candy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Coakley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Goodnes!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! 150 calories per bar. Dark Chocolate on the bottom. Packed in box with foam lined all around and cooler packs. Arrived in super condition. Ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Nightengale

customer_reviews.title: Good tyreat
customer_reviews.text: Yum. These are really good. As a diabetic, nice to take with me for a snack. I like all the flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: These are really good and the price is better than at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: GGC

customer_reviews.title: These are the most tasty bars that are good for you
customer_reviews.text: These are the most tasty bars that are good for you. I like the fact that the bars are in four pieces. This way you can eat the bar a little at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for when I'm hungry. They were cheap. The taste is a bit weird though...
customer_reviews.author: Ruth0129

customer_reviews.title: Box was shredded, and product tasted like it was close to needing to be thrown out
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these bars before, so I'm not too sure why this was such a bad shipment. When I opened the package, the box on the inside was shredded. The bars also tasted quite a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: Qadarra

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty little snacks. One or two of the little squares makes a satisfying snack or dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: I really like the taste of the product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste of the product, but the seller shipped these bars in the hot summer without using dry ice, so the chocolate melted in each of the packages. This really affected the taste of the chocolate. I think I will have to return them. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS - With a Hint of Peach!
customer_reviews.text: DELICIOUS! Nice mix of flavor with a hint of peach. Not artificial tasting like some brands of similar bars.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki In NoVa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: these are pretty good, each "bar" comes with 4 squares in them. so I snack on one and put the rest in a zip lock bag. Not too sweet though.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonC

customer_reviews.title: Give them a try, you'll probably like them as much as I do
customer_reviews.text: A prefernce item, but I like them. Healthier than most snacks, not loaded with sugar. Highly recommend you give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. RobTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It's too good to share
customer_reviews.text: i shared this with friends at my bowling league, but won't again. It's too good to share! But I told them where to find it.
customer_reviews.author: just talkin

product_meta.title: goodnessKNOWS Blueberry, Almond & Dark Chocolate Gluten Free Snacks Square Bars 12-Count Box
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Blueberry AlmondWhen you're trying to live a healthy life, you want more than a granola bar. goodnessKNOWS Snack Squares are delicious snack bars crafted with the goodness of whole nuts, real fruits, toasted oats and dark chocolate. Plus, they have no artificial colors, flavors or sweeteners. Each goodnessKNOWS Snack Bar Pack contains four delicious snack squares made with real blueberries, roasted almonds and dark chocolate. We hand-select our cocoa beans, then use a patented method that helps retain much of the bean’s naturally occurring cocoa flavanols. Whether you want office snacks or a treat when backpacking outdoors, these tasty snack bars inspire wholesome moments. Try a little goodness with goodnessKNOWS Blueberry, Almond and Dark Chocolate Snack Bars.
